website_summaries.verdict: The North Face Hedgehog Fastpack GTX is a hiking shoe that offers a lightweight and grippy ride. Amplifying its good points are its comfort and excellent waterproofing. On the flipside, its lack of support and drawn-out break-in phase tarnished its somewhat unparalleled reputation in the outdoor footwear game. Overall, The North Face Hedgehog Fastpack GTX can still work in a variety of outdoor conditions but would require adjustments from the user's end.
pros: The majority was pleased with how comfortable the pair was
Its waterproof Gore-Tex membrane was efficient, according to many satisfied users
Several wearers appreciated the excellent traction provided by the outsole on various trails
The North Face Hedgehog Fastpack GTX was fairly a good option to wear as an everyday shoe, as observed by a few owners
More than a handful would recommend this low-cut hiking shoe
They were zealous in getting another pair
These hikers were relatively light, as testified by some wearers
A professional blogger thought it was a piece of cake getting his Hedgehog Fastpack GTXs cleaned up
cons: A significant number of those who purchased the shoes were disappointed with the insoles
They said it had very minimal arch support and to one’s frustration, he even felt like walking on cardboard
These day hiking shoes were a bit narrow, according to some male reviewers
Its prolonged break-in period garnered the ire of a few reviewers

customer_reviews.title: !!!NOT WATERPROOF!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Mailman is extremely disappointed. Not only are they NOT WATERPROOF, the insole is worse than a bed of POPSICLE STICKS, and to top it off they are RIDICULOUSLY OVERPRICED. I thought spending the EXTRA MONEY on a WELL-KNOWN BRAND would pay off, but that was INCORRECT.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pair of boots. Light weight and absolutely beautiful, fit is fantastic, and feel great to walk/hike in. I've had these for a little less than a month, and have been tromping around in mud, snow, rain and ice on the daily, and have not had a single problem. They keep my feet nice and warm especially with my wool insoles. I rubbed some beeswax into them for extra water protection and it darkened the color significantly, hard to say if it made them more waterproof as I hadn't had any problems. Perhaps I am in the honeymoon phase, but I am in love with these boots, definitely my favorite pair I've ever gotten, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan K.

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had more of these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I have a pair of Timberlands, Columbia and now these. At first try, I was a little worried the width would be too tight. I loosened the laces a bit and that helped, however, still too tight (I have a wide foot). I assumed the would relax with wear and sure enough, within 30 minutes, they already began to “relax” and fit comfortably. No issues with wet/snow although I was only wearing them in 2-3 inches of snow. Overall very satisfied at first impression. The color was true to the picture and the length was perfect and as expected.
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: NOT  built to last
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give these 5 stars, they fit good. They are comfortable. But after wearing them less than 15 times in the month and a half that I have had them the tips of the toe where the rubber meets the lather has torn significantly. For a pair of $100 boots I expect them to last longer than this. I can’t return them because I’ve had them longe than 40 days. I feel like I’ve been ripped off for sure. I need another pair of boots for work, any recommendations? Big fail North Face!
customer_reviews.author: Toni T.

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit!!
customer_reviews.text: This is counterfeit! 1 hole at the top laces instead of 2. Terrible knock off. The fit is also terrible compared to an actual North Face shoe of the same type. Its an obvious con job.
customer_reviews.author: vintage gardens

customer_reviews.title: Sizing heads up:  Run smaller than in past
customer_reviews.text: I love these hiking boots and have owned many pairs over the years. I find it difficult to find hiking boots that fit me comfortably, so I was delighted to find these. My heels jut out, causing the fit issue. I’ve always worn a size 12, and it always fit me comfortably. That is until now. The most recent pair I purchased was too small for my left foot. I returned them and order a size 12.5. They fit fine and seem to work fine. No idea why they would change the sizing of the shoe, but be forewarned.
customer_reviews.author: Diver

customer_reviews.title: KNOCK OFFS!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could have given -5 stars I would have! It’s a good thing I buy this shoe whenever I can for back up! I wear these for work and they are excellent - when they are the actual shoe!! As soon as I opened the box, I KNEW they were fake! I still have a pair so it was easy for me to tell the difference! I’ve never gotten a knock off before on Amazon, but I wasn’t surprised because I know others have for The North Face gear. So be careful - next day, - RETURNED!!!
customer_reviews.author: darksom1

customer_reviews.title: Comfy from the word "Go"
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how comfortable these shoes were from right out of the box. Well made and extremely light, these waterproof hikers have quickly become my favorite go-to shoes this winter here in Louisiana. We don't get much colder than 40*F but it's wet most of the time, these are awesome shoes for my every day or weekend wear.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Salvetti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wide Shoe. . . for me
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and it's always hit or miss when it comes to the perfect shoe. This is my third pair. I go through them quickly because I use them for everything. They are pretty water resistant and pretty durable. Sometimes I power wash them to clean them up and they survive beautifully. Recently I accidentally got deck sealer on them and I believe it just came off them. So I'm always on the look out for this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Liquidmachine

customer_reviews.title: Half a size small but very comfortable and warm boots
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought these in my normal size which is 9.5 and they were too small so I had to return them and get a bigger size. After the new pair which was the correct size showed up, they fit correctly and are very comfortable to wear. I wore these to work for eight plus hours and they kept my feet warm in the fall Michigan weather and are very comfortable for long periods of time. Looking forward to see how they hold up in snow and ice.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUserPerson

customer_reviews.title: Pros - Excellent traction, Gore-Tex material is quality and keeps feet ...
customer_reviews.text: Cons - Break-in took a little bit. Stock insoles are too thin, replaced with orange Superfeet, lace pulled apart but it's still hanging in there. Pros - Excellent traction, Gore-Tex material is quality and keeps feet dry for a bit. I read water meters, so walking in all weather conditions is mandatory. The soles are going up well to the daily abuse. These shoes are very comfortable. They do eventually let moisture in, but I haven't found any Gore-Tex that is 100% water proof. I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: jetskiracer

customer_reviews.title: Still need to try them out.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my trip to Colorado. Foot fell in 3 feet of soft snow. Didnt notice my socks were all wet till I got home. But I believe since the way my whole foot fell into the snow, it got wet from the top of my ankle down. I would say they are comfy and feel great and make the foot feel snug.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and great looking
customer_reviews.text: These boots are seriously the most comfortable pair I have ever owned. I don’t do any hiking I just wanted a soft toe boot that didn’t look bad with some jeans and that I wouldn’t worry about getting wet or dirty.
customer_reviews.author: J. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these boots and says he wants to purchase another pair. The only thing wrong with them is they are very easy to scuff and came a little scuffed from the packaging and delivery. Overall, the scratches were not bad at all and the product was definitely worth the money spent! Great price and fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Halsey

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for wide foot
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a high quality make but it is really for wider feet. I had to go with the North Face Ultra 109 Waterproof because of that. If you have rather bulky and wide feet these are worth a try. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Everything You..Nothing You Dont
customer_reviews.text: I’ve searched for a solid 3 months for an affordable yet capable boot. I wanted something durable but not super heavy seeing as how my intended purpose would require some fast pace moving. I like the speed laces at the top, overall good boot. Has some weight to it, so it doesn’t feel like you’ll bust right through the toe box. I’m going to buy another pair, for the price. You can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff T

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is the best waterproof hiking shoe that I have owned in 30 years of living in Vermont. Comfortable with excellent traction on wet slippery rock surfaces
customer_reviews.author: lostinstowe

customer_reviews.title: The details you want to know....
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have a very sturdy build, particularly the sole. In fact the sole is so sturdy it's not very flexible. True hiking to the core, these shoes are built for slower more methodical steps in rugged terrain. I used them to travel in southeast Asia and they were okay I would say 7/10, 3 stars overall.
customer_reviews.author: C B

customer_reviews.title: I wear size 14 shoe they are hard to find so over all I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product as a general walk about on the farm. When I first put the shoe on the heel area of the right foot felt rough. After 15 or 20 minutes of walking about my foot acclimated to the condition as I got on with my chores. I had hoped after they had been broken in that they would be more comfortable as of yet not the case. I still gave them four stars because after that first 15 or 20 they are fine for the rest of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Herstowski

customer_reviews.title: Great kicks!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as advertised, I got what I paid for. Already took them out a few times and put 100+ miles on them. Perfect for the lighter trails when not in the mood to fully gear up.
customer_reviews.author: Number One

customer_reviews.title: Back on track
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy shoe, on par with recent north face products. They seem to have turned a corner. Plastic membrane is noisy as in most flexible waterproof shoes, but not anything annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Fore! Tunate

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This came out of the box a perfect fit and required no break-in time for me. I am a hard to fit size 13 W so having this shoe fit right from the beginning was a huge benefit. I am also a large frame body so having this support was also important. I will recommend this shoe and vendor for future shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Lightness in walking comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes! Lightweight. Love this pair of shoes! Perfect for my super long walks!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bhaiya

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Husband is really hard to fit in shoes! These are amazing! He loves everything about them!
customer_reviews.author: Kammē Oler

customer_reviews.title: Good trail shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe. A litter wider than I expected based on reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Secret Santa

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son, size 12, he said they fit just right and are very comfortable. Nice and sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: Scdunphy

customer_reviews.title: You never know what shape they will be in until you get them
customer_reviews.text: I got them for my son they looked cheap and scuffed but my son liked them
customer_reviews.author: Judea

customer_reviews.title: My husbands loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and practical. Bought them for my hubby for work but he liked them so much he decided not to use them for work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfy once they're broken in. Waterproof, good traction and tread. No insulation however, so get good socks if you plan on snow
customer_reviews.author: Billy Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Tough working, long lasting, low price Boots.
customer_reviews.text: Good all around boot, worn them for years to work delivering for ups. They hold up to a lot of abuse for a pretty light boot. I average 8 miles a day at work and can usually get 7/8 months a pair from these better than anything else I’ve tried in 20 years working there.
customer_reviews.author: Thor

customer_reviews.title: I've found a good price point on a good performer; we'll  see how well they'll do in time!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my feet constantly and need shoes to fit and perform properly!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hair

customer_reviews.title: Consider going up a size
customer_reviews.text: Boots are very stylish.. but the tie area is much tougher right compared to the rest of the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very fashionable boot
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son he and loves them!
customer_reviews.author: K. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Great boots for getting around in winter. I wouldn't recommend these for hiking unless you put insoles in them. I stepped in a 4 in. Deep puddle. The waterproofing works. I would say 5 stars, but I wouldn't want to hike all day in them.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable boots I own
customer_reviews.text: They feel like sneakers I can wear these all day at work with no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Jaysun14

customer_reviews.title: Sole Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: The sole is narrow. A high top shoe is purchased to give support to the ankle. The narrow sole provides less stability. I returned and received a full refund as promised.
customer_reviews.author: NathanR

customer_reviews.title: I got Blisters....
customer_reviews.text: Very light , but after I hike for 2 day , I got blisters very bad
customer_reviews.author: Jose gabriel lugo

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase
customer_reviews.text: These make my feet hurt at the lateral side of my ankle and feel a bit sloppy. I am outside the return period(wish I could) I was trying to have them break in but just seems to be getting worse I would NOT recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots 👢
customer_reviews.text: I am not terribly familiar with hiking boots but these completely did everything I needed from them.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Thurmond

customer_reviews.title: I really like the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoes. I use them for work and I am fairly hard on them, I got 14 months out of them so I feel got my money's worth
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: there ok not worth 122 dollars. maybe a 60 dollar shoe. not so warm as i was led to believe .
customer_reviews.author: arthur d.

customer_reviews.title: great boots
customer_reviews.text: love the style, comfort, and especially water resistant pay off these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Pasi

customer_reviews.title: durable and comfy
customer_reviews.text: It has wonderful cushion inside, so very comfortable. Top part might be irritating cuz it touches your ankle. Other than that, it's a great shoes to wear in winter.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be holding up well and it's not very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sneaker
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a waterproof shoe and reading the great reviews on some hiking websites I decided to give them a try. Very nice product, highly recommended. I am on my feet all day and they are very comfortable. I would get some Balega socks to go with them. You will not regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Geneva I.

customer_reviews.title: Good winter boots.
customer_reviews.text: Boots are warm. Comfortable. Not slippery. But the legs are pretty sweaty. Therefore, only 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ruslan Ugnavyy

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these boots. He says they are very comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy  Menifee

customer_reviews.title: Best winter boots ever
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and good winter boots this is my third pair since 2009
customer_reviews.author: Walker Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy! The boot is all scratch and marked. It seems like USED! Disaster!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Everyday wear
customer_reviews.text: This hair great every day shoes. I own another pair I use for hiking!
customer_reviews.author: Teri Driver

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi J Bettencourt

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very happy with the shoes and very fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit the same as other North Face shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pretty hardcore commute walker. I log about 55 miles a workweek and I bought these with the expectation that they'd fit the same at the North Face Ultra 109s that I bought from R.E.I. I LOVED those shoes. These shoes fit as expected, but I felt a "hardness" on the spot on the sole where the ball of my foot rests. I figured they'd break in after a week or so, but they never did. I've now logged about 200 miles on them and I think I've given up on them. Since there seems to be a bit of inconsistency with the North Face shoes I'll likely not buy another pair online.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sigua

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof at all.
customer_reviews.text: Started out great. Slowly (within less than a year) began leaking in water and holding it for days. Obviously smelled awful after that. So I stuck using them as winter hiking boots if it wasn’t wet. Then the stitching came apart. I usually love northface products but these ones are a no go. There’s better options for the money.
customer_reviews.author: kane

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 12.5 and these are too narrow. If you have wider feet going a size up won't fix it in this brand IMO. The Chilkats are also too narrow. I'd suggest Columbia wides if you are like me. I can't wear North Face unless they made a 12.5 or 13 wide insulated snow boot, and they don't seem to have one available right now.
customer_reviews.author: John Dandell

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot if you dont have wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality boot. Looks great. If you have slightly wider feet, these will not work. I am almost always a standard size 11, but both an 11 and 11.5 did not fit and squeezed the evaliving out of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Drew K

customer_reviews.title: Let's hit the snow!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice winter boots which deliver top comfort and support to the feet. Note that the size is somewhat larger then expected and although I usually wear a 43 EU size and these are 42.5 they were still a bit too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Freezing and not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These boots aren’t waterproof and during whole day you will freeze as with sport shoes in a snow! Doesn’t cost this money!
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandre

customer_reviews.title: North face quality
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish of the boat is very nice it fit as expected and is easy to clean try not to walk around and very dusty areas though after a year it will eventually turn a greenish black
customer_reviews.author: Brandon & Fuki

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable out of the box for all-day wear
customer_reviews.text: These may be the most comfortable shoes/boots of any style that I've ever owned, and they are comfortable straight out of the box. I'm wearing them all day, whether walking around or at my standing desk. I have not hiked in them. The interior offers the necessary support, but is comfortable as a slipper. The sole is cushioned enough to compete with the best of walking shoes. I do add half arch supports to all my shoes, and without them, this pair would offer minimal as arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

product_meta.title: The North Face Men's Hedgehog Fastpack
product_meta.description: Move swiftly over the trail in rain or shine, when you trek with The North Face Hedgehog Fastpack GTX hiking shoe underfoot. GORE-TEX membrane delivers breathable, waterproof protection from outside elements. PU-coated leather and abrasion-resistant, breathable mesh upper materials. Protective, welded TPU quarter overlays. Classic lace-up closure. Rustproof hardware. Protective toe cap. TPU-CRADLE? heel-stabilizing technology. Heel pull loop. Padded tongue and collar. Breathable fabric lining offers a great in-shoe feel. Molded foam insole. Dual-density, compression-molded EVA midsole with CRADLE? GUIDE technology. TPU shank. Vibram rubber outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 1 lb 1 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: HEDGEHOG FASTPACK GORE-TEX HIKING SHOES: Waterproof, breathable trail running shoes for wide feet that offer rubber soles for traction and protection on wet and dry surfaces. Features vibram rubber outsoles.
TRAIL RUNNING SHOES: The North Face trail running shoes & hiking boots are designed for running on uneven terrain, lightweight, but durable and sturdy. Protect your feet and perfect your form.
MORE THAN JACKETS: If you're looking to spend more time on the slopes or the trails, get equipped with jackets for men, coats for men, men's ski pants, men's boots, and more!
MORE THAN BOOTS: From snow boots & hiking boots to trail running & training shoes to flip flops & beach sandals, The North Face keeps you on your feet and enjoying an active outdoors life.
OUTDOOR APPAREL: Whether you're skiing, snowboarding, camping, hiking, training, running, or climbing, The North Face has the snow gear, boots, jackets, scarves or warm winter hats you need.
